statement.p: A city's population in the year \displaystyle{x}=1989 was \displaystyle{y}=1,381,550. In 1994 the population was 1,381,300.
Compute the slope of the population growth (or decline) and choose the most accurate statement from the following:

ol.li: The population is decreasing at a rate of 100 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 100 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 200 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 200 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 50 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 50 people per year.

ul.li: E: The population is decreasing at a rate of 50 people per year.
